title: asset_label_attached_banana_tree_ban_0002_post_cut
summary: Asset ID label attached to banana tree BAN-0002 after inflorescence cut.
description: Image documents the attachment of DGCP asset identification labels on banana tree BAN-0002 after the inflorescence cut event. Labels explicitly reference the primary event and Proof 543.

external_reference.note: External image reference showing asset ID labels attached after cutting.
